message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $130. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider $110?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While I value the product at more than $110, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $120?  That still gives us both a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I think $115 would be a fair price for both of us.
